text: Mervyn Hart "Merv" Harvey (7 July 1922 – 21 November 1987) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile from Collingwood Forever Category:1922 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Merv Harvey (footballer)
